OPTION.NAME: -pass-exit-codes
OPTION.DESC: Exit with highest error code from a phase

OPTION.NAME: -fast-math
OPTION.DESC: Use alternative floating point support routines

OPTION.NAME: -Wa,
OPTION.DESC: Pass comma-separated options on to the assembler

OPTION.NAME: -Wp,
OPTION.DESC: Pass comma-separated options on to the preprocessor

OPTION.NAME: -Wl,
OPTION.DESC: Pass comma-separated options on to the linker

OPTION.NAME: -Xassembler
OPTION.DESC: Pass arg on to the assembler

OPTION.NAME: -Xpreprocessor
OPTION.DESC: Pass arg on to the preprocessor

OPTION.NAME: -Xlinker
OPTION.DESC: Pass arg on to the linker

OPTION.NAME: -Xlinker --script=
OPTION.DESC: Linker script

OPTION.NAME: -combine
OPTION.DESC: Pass multiple source files to compiler at once

OPTION.NAME: -save-temps
OPTION.DESC: Do not delete intermediate files

OPTION.NAME: -pipe
OPTION.DESC: Use pipes rather than intermediate files

OPTION.NAME: -time
OPTION.DESC: Time the execution of each subprocess

OPTION.NAME: -specs=
OPTION.DESC: Override built-in specs with the contents of file

OPTION.NAME: -std=
OPTION.DESC: Assume that the input sources are for standard

OPTION.NAME: -B
OPTION.DESC: Add directory to the compiler's search paths

OPTION.NAME: -E
OPTION.DESC: Preprocess only; do not compile, assemble or link

OPTION.NAME: -S
OPTION.DESC: Compile only; do not assemble or link

OPTION.NAME: -c
OPTION.DESC: Compile and assemble, but do not link

OPTION.NAME: -o
OPTION.DESC: Place the output into file

OPTION.NAME: -x
OPTION.DESC: Specify the language of the following input files

OPTION.NAME: -x
OPTION.DESC: Specify the language of the following input files

OPTION.NAME: -omf=
OPTION.DESC: Select coff or elf object module format

OPTION.NAME: -mtrack
OPTION.DESC: Track auto psv page

OPTION.NAME: -mlarge-arrays
OPTION.DESC: Allow arrays larger than 32K

OPTION.NAME: -menable-large-arrays
OPTION.DESC: Allow arrays larger than 32K

OPTION.NAME: -mnear-chars
OPTION.DESC: Place "char" variables into near data space, regardless of memory model

OPTION.NAME: -munified
OPTION.DESC: Use unified data model

OPTION.NAME: -mno-file
OPTION.DESC: Disable placing file directive in assembly output

OPTION.NAME: -mno-isr-warn
OPTION.DESC: Disable warning for inappropriate use of ISR function names

OPTION.NAME: -msmart-io
OPTION.DESC: Enable smart IO library call forwarding

OPTION.NAME: -mno-pa
OPTION.DESC: Do not run procedural abstraction stage

OPTION.NAME: -mpa
OPTION.DESC: Run procedural abstraction stage

OPTION.NAME: -mconst-in-code
OPTION.DESC: Put constants in code space

OPTION.NAME: -mconst-in-data
OPTION.DESC: Put constants in data space

OPTION.NAME: -mlarge-code
OPTION.DESC: Use large code model

OPTION.NAME: -msmall-code
OPTION.DESC: Use small code model

OPTION.NAME: -mlarge-aggregate
OPTION.DESC: Use large aggregate data model

OPTION.NAME: -msmall-aggregate
OPTION.DESC: Use small aggregate data model

OPTION.NAME: -mlarge-scalar
OPTION.DESC: Use large scalar data model

OPTION.NAME: -msmall-scalar
OPTION.DESC: Use small scalar data model

OPTION.NAME: -mlarge-data
OPTION.DESC: Use large data model

OPTION.NAME: -msmall-data
OPTION.DESC: Use small data model

OPTION.NAME: -mtext=
OPTION.DESC: Name the text section (default .text)

OPTION.NAME: -msmart-io=
OPTION.DESC: Set smart IO library call forwarding level

OPTION.NAME: -mresource=
OPTION.DESC: Identify MPLABC30 resource file

OPTION.NAME: -mpa=
OPTION.DESC: Procedural abstraction nesting limit

OPTION.NAME: -mit=
OPTION.DESC: Enable instrumented trace

OPTION.NAME: -mfillupper=
OPTION.DESC: Select global fillupper value for data stored in FLASH

OPTION.NAME: -merrata=
OPTION.DESC: Enable compiler generated work-arounds for specific errata

OPTION.NAME: -mcpu=
OPTION.DESC: Select target CPU

OPTION.NAME: -g
OPTION.DESC: Generate symbolic debug info

OPTION.NAME: --no-relax
OPTION.DESC: Turn off relaxation (default)

OPTION.NAME: --relax
OPTION.DESC: Use shorter branches and RCALLs when possible

OPTION.NAME: --processor=
OPTION.DESC: Specify the target processor (e.g., 30F2010)

OPTION.NAME: --boot
OPTION.DESC: Specify options for boot segment

OPTION.NAME: --data-init
OPTION.DESC: Initialize data memory (default)

OPTION.NAME: --no-data-init
OPTION.DESC: Don't initialize data memory

OPTION.NAME: --debug
OPTION.DESC: Produce linker debugging messages

OPTION.NAME: --handles
OPTION.DESC: Create jump table for function pointers (default)

OPTION.NAME: --no-handles
OPTION.DESC: Don"t create jump table for function pointers

OPTION.NAME: --fill-upper
OPTION.DESC: Set fill value for upper byte of data (default = 0)

OPTION.NAME: --force-link
OPTION.DESC: Force linking of objects that may not be compatible

OPTION.NAME: --no-force-link
OPTION.DESC: Don"t force linking (default)

OPTION.NAME: --general
OPTION.DESC: Specify options for general segment

OPTION.NAME: --heap
OPTION.DESC: Create heap of SIZE bytes

OPTION.NAME: --isr
OPTION.DESC: Create interrupt function for unused vectors (default)

OPTION.NAME: --no-isr
OPTION.DESC: Don"t create interrupt function for unused vectors

OPTION.NAME: --pack-data
OPTION.DESC: Use upper byte of program memory to store data (default)

OPTION.NAME: --no-pack-data
OPTION.DESC: Don"t use upper byte of program memory to store data

OPTION.NAME: --report-mem
OPTION.DESC: Report memory usage to console

OPTION.NAME: --secure
OPTION.DESC: Specify options for secure segment

OPTION.NAME: --select-objects
OPTION.DESC: Select library objects based on options (default)

OPTION.NAME: --no-select-objects
OPTION.DESC: Don"t select library objects based on options

OPTION.NAME: --smart-io
OPTION.DESC: Merge I/O library functions (default)

OPTION.NAME: --no-smart-io
OPTION.DESC: Don't merge I/O library functions

OPTION.NAME: --stack
OPTION.DESC: Set minimum stack to SIZE bytes (default=16)

OPTION.NAME: --stackguard
OPTION.DESC: Set stack guardband to SIZE bytes (default=16)

OPTION.NAME: -l
OPTION.DESC: Library name to include

OPTION.NAME: -a
OPTION.DESC: sort sections by address

OPTION.NAME: -u
OPTION.DESC: use upper-case hex digits

OPTION.NAME: -v
OPTION.DESC: print verbose messages

DETECT.KEYLOC: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microchip\MPLAB C for PIC24 MCUs and-or dsPIC DSCs
